00017 function getImages($product) {
00021   $json = json_decode(fget('http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/services/search/images?v=1.0&q=' . urlencode($product)));
00025   $imgpath = $json->responseData->results[0]->tbUrl;
00029   $imgsource = $json->responseData->results[0]->visibleUrl;
00033   $imgsourceurl = $json->responseData->results[0]->tbUrl;
00037   $imgcontext = $json->responseData->results[0]->originalContextUrl;
00041   $output = '';
00042   $output = <<<_HTML
00043     <div id="prodimg">
00044       <a href="#">
00045         <img src="images/arrows/left.png" alt="Previous Image" title="Previous Image" />
00046       </a>
00047       <a href="$imgcontext" target="_blank">
00048         <img src="$imgpath" alt="Image of $product From $imgsource" title="Image of $product From $imgsource">
00049       </a>
00050       <a href="#">
00051         <img src="images/arrows/right.png" alt="Next Image" title="Next Image" />
00052       </a><br />
00053       <a href="aboutimages.html" target="_blank" onclick="popup(this.href, 200, 300); return false;">About this image</a>
00054     </div>
00055 _HTML;
00056 
00057   return $output;
00058 }
